scripts.publish:web: cross-env VUE_APP_TARGET_PLATFORM=web vue-cli-service build && node deploy.js
scripts.build:android: cross-env VUE_APP_TARGET_PLATFORM=android vue-cli-service build --skip-plugins @vue/cli-plugin-eslint && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File build.ps1
scripts.publish:android: cross-env VUE_APP_TARGET_PLATFORM=android vue-cli-service build --skip-plugins @vue/cli-plugin-eslint && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File build_publish.ps1
scripts.gitpush: git add . && git commit -m "XXX" && git push
scripts.clear: rmdir /s /q node_modules && del package-lock.json && npm install
